name: copilot-ld
description: Intelligent chat agent built with GitHub Copilot and Linked Data
author: D. Olsson <hi@senzilla.io>

scripts.data:init: mkdir -p generated data/cli data/eval data/graphs data/memories data/policies data/resources data/traces data/vectors data/tenants
scripts.data:clean: rm -rf generated data/cli data/eval data/graphs data/memories data/policies data/resources data/traces data/vectors data/tenants
scripts.data:reset: npm run data:clean && npm run data:init && npm run codegen
scripts.process: npm run process:assistants && npm run process:resources && npm run process:tools && npm run process:graphs && npm run process:vectors
scripts.process:fast: npm run process:assistants && npm run process:resources && npm run process:tools && npm run process:graphs
scripts.dev:restart: npm --silent run dev:stop && npm --silent run dev:start
scripts.docker: npm run docker:build && npm run docker:up
scripts.docker:upload: docker compose up -d storage && npx env-cmd -- env MINIO_ENDPOINT=http://localhost:9000 npx --workspace=@copilot-ld/libutil upload && docker compose down
scripts.test: find extensions packages services test -name '*.test.js' | xargs node --test
scripts.test:watch: find extensions packages services test -name '*.test.js' | xargs node --test --watch
scripts.check: npm run spellcheck && npm run format && npm run lint
scripts.check:fix: npm run spellcheck && npm run format:fix && npm run lint:fix
scripts.cli:chat: npm --silent run dev:start -- --silent && npx env-cmd -- node ./scripts/chat.js
scripts.cli:search: npm --silent run dev:start -- --silent && npx env-cmd -- node ./scripts/search.js
scripts.cli:query: npm --silent run dev:start -- --silent && npx env-cmd -- node ./scripts/query.js
scripts.cli:subjects: npm --silent run dev:start -- --silent && npx env-cmd -- node ./scripts/subjects.js
scripts.cli:window: npm --silent run dev:start -- --silent && npx env-cmd -- node ./scripts/window.js
scripts.cli:completion: npm --silent run dev:start -- --silent && npx env-cmd -- node ./scripts/completion.js
scripts.cli:tiktoken: npm --silent run dev:start -- --silent && npx env-cmd -- node ./scripts/tiktoken.js
scripts.cli:unary: npm --silent run dev:start -- --silent && npx env-cmd -- node ./scripts/unary.js
scripts.eval: npm --silent run dev:start -- --silent && npx env-cmd -- npx --workspace=@copilot-ld/libeval evaluation
scripts.eval:reset: rm -rf data/dev.log data/cli/* data/eval/* data/memories/* data/resources/common.Conversation.* data/traces/* && npm --silent run dev:restart -- --silent
